name: raspy
description: Raspy lets you control your Raspberry Pi.
author: Ardalan Samimi <ardalan@saturnfive.se>

scripts.install: npm run install_client && npm run install_server
scripts.dev_client: node build/increment-version.js service=client --version=build && cd client && webpack-dev-server --inline --progress --config build/webpack.dev.conf.js
scripts.build: node build/increment-version.js && cd client && npm run build
